RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 85. Starter Allowance Purse 23700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $8,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 26 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WILDCAT EXPRESS took command shortly away from the gate while well held, cleared into the turn and widened his advantage steadily without ever being seriously threatened. MANNFORD missed the break to be away at the back of the field, circled the field on the bend in a long drive to gain and hold the place in a good effort. RECKLESS L J stalked the pacesetter to the head of the stretch and failed to gain ground in the drive. PRIVATE DRIVE tracked the pace from three wide through the turn and went evenly failing to mount a closing bid. TIGER TRAIL hustled along the fence to prominent early, chased the leaders through the turn and lacked a late response. JOSH'N trailed most of the way and was never a threat. MASTEROFTHEHOUNDS was never a factor and bled.

ENTRY.NAME: Tiger Trail
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, chased, no late response

ENTRY.NAME: Mannford
ENTRY.COMMENT: missed break, circled, long drive, good effort

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 59. Allowance Purse 33700. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 26 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In WeightAllowanc es).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PROSECUTOR set a pressured pace while well held in the early going, responded to all challenges, gamely battled through the lane and just prevailed by the shortest of margins on the wire in a game effort. PRESSLEY RIDGE tracked the leaders into the turn, circled five wide entering the bend exchanging bumps with inside rival, ranged up to engage the pacesetter in upper stretch, dueled through the lane with that one down the lane in close quarters and was denied at the wire. ORLEANS STORM rated just off the leaders down the backside, was jostled between horses while racing four wide into the turn losing momentum and kept on in the drive to gain the show. WAR ON THE RIVER stalked the pace into the from three wide, was bumped entering the turn from the outside causing him to drop in a path in close proximity to inside rival making that one steady off heels, lost position on the bend and finished evenly. BIG TIME FLIRT pressed the pace down the backside from between horses racing two wide, steadied off heels into the turn when losing racing room while outside rivals bumped and dropping inside into his path, and lacked any rally after that incident. AGNELLO CITY broke inward toward the gap leaving the gate and continued on as no threat. PLAYING BALL step slow from the gate and was never a factor. THE STEWARDS POSTED AN INQUIRY AND THE RIDER OF BIG TIME FLIRT CLAIMED FOUL AGAINST WAR ON THE RIVER FOR INTERFERENCE ON THE THE TURN NEAR THE THREE-EIGHTHS POLE, UPON REVIEW THE STEWARDS MADE NO CHANGE.

ENTRY.NAME: Prosecutor
ENTRY.OWNER: Poe Racing Stable LLC and 8 and 3 Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, responded, dug-in, just held

ENTRY.NAME: Big Time Flirt
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, steadied off heels, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: War On the River
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, bump turn, dropped back, even late

ENTRY.NAME: Orleans Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, jostled turn 4 wide, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Pressley Ridge
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked, circled 5 wide, bumped turn, stretch duel, denied

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 17600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 26 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Races Where Entered For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Pre ferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CANDY CRUSHEM unhurried early to be well off the pace, circled six wide into the far turn, made a steady advance down the lane and was up in time. SMASH set the pace from the onset, opened a clear advantage down the backside, widened the lead in the final bend and weakened late to be caught in the fina lyards. SUDDEN SHIFT slow early to be near the back of the field, made up ground in the final turn, weaved erratically in upper stretch, leveled out in mid-stretch and closed well to be gaining late. FRANCO reserved off the pace to race mid-pack down the backside, saved ground coming home and failed to closed ground late. CITY PLAN raced wide in the first turn to move up to prompt the pace through the final bend and weakened coming home. LAUDA SPEED well placed early and lacked a closing rally. CAMP PENDLETON contended for the first half and had no response when called upon. KERANOS broke awkwardly, trailed the field to the head o the lane and showed some late interest leveling out in the lane. VENETIAN DREAM tracked the leaders for a half and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Keranos
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Sudden Shift
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, closed well, erratic stretch, gaining

ENTRY.NAME: Candy Crushem
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, circled 6w, steady advance, up in time

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 57. Maiden Claiming Purse 10500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOLDEN HEIST reserved off the pace to the turn, rallied from two wide in the bend steadily advancing down the lane, found best stride late and pulled clear in the late going. ZIPSY ROSE LEE rallied six wide in the turn and kept coming down the lane to be up for the place. MAGGIE E sped to the lead, opened a wide advantage to mid-stretch and stopped inside the sixteenth pole. CLIMATE unhurried early to be near the rear of the field and made a mild bid in the stretch. GIO'S MY DAD rallied five wide in the turn and failed to gain down the stretch while continuing to drift wide. STRIKING MELODY stalked the pace to the top of the lane and faded down the stretch. RAG TOWN failed to menace. BAD AND BEAUTIFUL was never a threat. CHOSEN BY GRACE chased the pace for a half and came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Gio's My Dad
ENTRY.COMMENT: rally 5 wide, drifted out, no late gain

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 11100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE DECEMBER 26. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 26 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000(Winners Since December 26, 2022 Preferred). (Ohio Regi stered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YOUVESAIDITALL reserved off the early pace, rallied three wide in the turn to engage the leaders at the head of the lane and drew off in the stretch. LUCKY JUNIOR pressed the pace throughout and kept on well down the lane to be second best while no match for the winner. TUFF ATTACK set the pace under pressure to mid-stretch and weakened late in the drive. CALL WEST made an early bid up the fence down the backside to threaten into the far turn and flattened out coming home. PARADE GRAND went evenly failing to mount a closing rally. ROYAL COUP trailed for a half mile and passed tiring rivals down the lane. GAMBLER stalked the pace into the final bend and faded. GEH SCHNELL was never a threat. BACK ALLEY CAT showed brief speed to contend early and came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Youvesaiditall
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, rally 3w, steady advance, drew off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 19500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 26 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PECKS NOT BAD stalked the pace through the turn, split rivals turning for home, took command in upper stretch and drew off down the lane. BUCKEYE RED tracked the pacesetters into the turn, rallied three wide to loom boldly turning for home and kept on through the lane. OVERLOAD reserved off the pace through the turn and finished well to be gaining down the stretch. PALACE TEMPTATION step slow from the gate to be at the rear of the field early, made up ground steadily down the backside and showed good late energy down in the lane. OHIO STRONG rallied five wide in the turn to be well positioned turning for home and failed to sustain the bid. COUNTRY RUCKUS pressed the pace from two wide into the turn, took the lead at the quarter pole and weakened in the drive. TAMMY'S TOY went evenly failing to menace. ROLLIN SO PERFECT slow early to be at the rear of the field and passed tiring rivals in the stretch. HEIDI'S SINATRA was never a threat. RED COMET was never a factor. STARS N SPACE contended early and steadily gave ground. BAD BOY BOOGIE set a pressured pace for a half mile and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Heidi's Sinatra
ENTRY.OWNER: Eyerman, Lee J. and Molumby, John

ENTRY.NAME: Pecks Not Bad
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, split rivals, took command, drew off

ENTRY.NAME: Buckeye Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, rallied 3 wide, loomed, kept on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 87. Claiming Purse 30100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 26 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).es) .

CLAIM.OWNER: Burnsworth Richard and Ultra Championship Racing LLC

RACE.FOOTNOTES: DARK VADER unhurried early under patient handling, circled eight wide at the head of the lane and was up late in a determined drive. IT'S OFFICIAL rated in mid-pack to the quarter pole, split rivals turning for home, took the lead in deep stretch and was caught in the final yards. OAKS HONEY raced wide throughout rallying from the six path to loom in upper stretch and was out-kicked in the late going. PLAY BALL tracked the leaders through the turn, rallied from five wide to take command in mid-stretch and weakened late in the drive. COUNTRY CLUB BOBBY well placed along the fence just off the pace, saved ground cutting the corner coming from home and lacked a good enough closing rally down the lane. TOTELLYOUTHETRUTH pressed the pace to the head of the lane and flattened out. THEDAYOFTHEGREY set a pressured pace to the quarter pole and gave way in the stretch. QUIET AMIGO failed to menace. FIRST SONG was never a factor. DERBY INCLUDED was not a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Country Club Bobby
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, saved ground, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: It's Official
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated mid-pack, bid, brief lead, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Thedayofthegrey
ENTRY.OWNER: Cline Robert C and Wilkinson Richard M

ENTRY.NAME: Play Ball
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked, bid 5 wide, took command, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 102. Allowance Purse 40900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of $22,000 Since October 26 Allowed 3 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Highest Earnings 2022-202 3 Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HENRY MAC stalked the pace into the turn, rallied three wide to engage the pacesetter in mid-stretch and drew clear late in the lane. LIBERATE set a well rated pace, responded when challenged in the lane and was out-finished late in the drive. RAVEN MOON slow early to trail and showed good late interest to gain the show. LIONISTIC prompted the pace down the backside under stout restraint, was well positioned in the turn to threaten and lacked a closing response when called upon. SIMON SAYS was never athreat.

ENTRY.NAME: Lionistic
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, well held, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Henry Mac
ENTRY.OWNER: Samuel Klein Jr LLC and Enjoy The Ride Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, bid 3 wide, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Liberate
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC Lewis Michael and S G M Thoroughbred Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, well rated, responded, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 9 6F Dirt CR: 57. Allowance Purse 33700. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 26 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In WeightAllowanc es).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EAGLE NEST well rated on the lead down the backside, opened a clear advantage turning for home and widened down the lane without a challenge. ANGELICO stalked the pacesetter through the turn, mounted a non-threatening bid at the head of the lane and kept on to be second best. IPPOLITO'S WONDER reserved off the pace down the backside, was in tight quarters into the turn having to be taken in hand, and rallied well down the lane. HAPPY TAKEOVER raced wide down the backside, was called upon into the turn to mount a rally and flattened out coming home. ORVILLE B tracked the leaders through the turn and failed to respond when called upon. JOHN PHILIP was never a threat. MUCH TIMES TWO contended early to be well place along the rail and faded in the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Happy Takeover
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide trip, asked early, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Eagle Nest
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated, clear lead, never threatened

ENTRY.NAME: Ippolito's Wonder
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, in tight turn, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Angelico
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, bid, no match, kept on
